title: Draw
text: Try drawing out the geometric shape

title: Length and Width
text: We can define length as x and width will then be x-2

title: Perimeter Definition
text: Perimeter is defined as the length around the shape. In this case that is $$2length+2width$$

title: Length
text: By solving the equation, the length will be $$\frac{parameter-2width}{2}$$
